channel.title: How do i make it kick?

item.title: How do i make it kick?
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

ok i added public int kickTimer = 0; to int list and added this to stop spammers make fake names if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("mod") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker") || playerName.contains("voldan") || playerName.contains("homo") || playerName.contains("hoe") || playerName.contains("fag") || playerName.contains("mag") || playerName.contains("penis") || playerName.contains("pussy") || playerName.contains("dick") || playerName.contains("ass") || playerName.contains("cock") || playerName.contains("own3r") || playerName.contains("serversucks") || playerName.contains("sucks") || playerName.contains("v0ld4n") || playerName.contains(" ") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch") || playerName.contains("zezima") || playerName.contains("dam") || playerName.contains("silab") || playerName.contains("miss silabsoft")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Illegal Character In Username"); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { appendToBanned(playerName); } kickTimer = 5; } }any ideas what i did wrong? btw i got no errors

Read full topic
